item.title: Install Sendy - Self Hosted Email Newsletter Application
item.description: What is Sendy? Sendy is a self hosted email newsletter application that lets you send trackable emails via Amazon Simple Email Service (SES). To install sendy on Ubuntu, do the following steps: Login to server, and install package. $ add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php $ apt update $ apt install php unzip $ apt install php-fpm libapache2-mod-php php-mysql php-curl php-xml $ apt install mariadb-server mariadb-client Letâ€™s run the security script to harden the SQL.
